meanings.definition: A declaration or assurance that one will do a particular thing or that a particular thing will happen.
meanings.sent1: Her promise to help with the project made everyone happy.
meanings.sent2: I believe his promise to finish the work on time.
meanings.sent3: The promise to bring cake to the party was forgotten.
meanings.sent4: The promise of a bright future kept her going during tough times.
meanings.sent5: His promise to always be there for her was like a warm hug.

meanings.definition: A reason to expect that something will happen in the future.
meanings.sent1: The dark clouds were a promise of rain.
meanings.sent2: The first signs of spring are a promise of warmer days ahead.
meanings.sent3: The promise of a snow day excited the students.
meanings.sent4: The promise of a promotion motivated him to work harder.
meanings.sent5: The blooming flowers were a promise of beauty in the garden.
